2059560.name: The Jean-Paul Software Screen Explosion Demo
2059560.description:
Grab the demo and get a risk-free taste of the critically acclaimed Jean-Paul Software Screen Explosion! Two screensavers available, with full customisation, and without any time limits, watermarks, or purchase reminders.

Demo features

  • Get that hyperspace feeling with the Tunnel O' Fun!
  • Procedurally generated post-war housing projects with The Nth Estate!
  • Merge your monitors into one giant cohesive screen!
  • Gaze in envy at owners of the full product until the urge to buy overwhelms you!

Any customisation you do will be preserved if you decide to buy the full product, so any monitor calibration you do will not be lost.
2059560.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
